detail_desc: T-shirt in soft cotton and modal jersey with a wide neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with frayed, raw-edge hems.
3/4-length leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Lightweight, unlined liner socks in fast-drying functional fabric with reinforcement at the toes and heels.

Set in soft cotton. T-shirt in jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Two long-sleeved tops in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Long-sleeved top in jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Two pairs of joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. One pair of joggers in jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist.

Ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a fake fly and button at the waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs with decorative sparkly studs and raw-edge hems. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for a comfortable fit.
Romper suit in patterned, intarsia-knit cotton with frilled shoulder straps, buttons at the back and ribbed hems.
Full-length, pleated dress in mesh with a deep V-neck, wrapover top and shoulder straps with silicone trims. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back, and a seam at the waist. Lined.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
T-shirt in soft, patterned, cotton jersey.
Scarf in a soft, fine knit with fringes on the short sides.
High-waisted shorts in woven fabric with a zip fly and hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets and a fake pocket at the back.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a crinkled weave containing some linen with elastication and smocking around the top and long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs.
Shaftless socks in thin cotton jersey with elastication at the top to hold them in place.
Long, round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey with a curved hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with roll-edge tops.
Body in lace with microfibre details, a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam under the bust, a lined gusset with press-studs, and a string back.
Ankle-length trousers in soft viscose jersey with covered elastication at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt and bottoms in soft, printed cotton jersey. T-shirt with a rounded hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Waist bag with a zip at the front and an adjustable waist strap with a plastic buckle. Size 7x16x30 cm.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-style jumper in a textured-knit cotton blend with a small stand-up collar, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a button on one shoulder, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in soft, fine-knit cashmere with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Joggers in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Fully lined, 5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and narrow hems. Jersey lining.
Fitted, stretch, turtleneck top with long sleeves and overlocked edges at the collar, cuffs and hem.
Wide, sturdy belt with a metal buckle that has a stud at the back. Width 3.4 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Maxi skirt in an airy, patterned, softly draping weave. High waist with a wide, draped, waistband and smocking and a concealed zip at the back. Satin lining.
Cardigan knitted in soft, garter-stitched cotton with buttons down the front and long sleeves.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Imitation leather sandals with a decorative appliqué at the front and a hook and loop tab. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic (TPR) rubber soles.
Ankle-length, tailored trousers in woven fabric with a hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases. Slits at the hems.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable strap and metal fastener at the back.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves with frills at the front, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dress in velour with a yoke and long sleeves in mesh. Round neckline, an opening at the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in jersey containing glittery threads with a V-neck and long sleeves.

Short, fitted dress in woven fabric with a shimmering pattern. Deep V-neck, shoulder pads, long sleeves, and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a double-layered front with a gathered seam at one side for a draping effect. Unlined.
Short, wide, off-the-shoulder blouse in lace with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, long sleeves with scalloped trims, and a scalloped hem. Partly lined in jersey.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Long top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Straight, relaxed fit with long sleeves and a curved hem.
Long-sleeved, fitted top in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Tape-trimmed V-neck front and back.
Metal rings in various designs.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric. High waist with covered elastication and gathered seams for width and volume. Lined. The polyester content of the skirt is partly recycled.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt pockets with a decorative button at the back. Legs with creases.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Shirt jacket in soft, washed denim with a lined hood and sleeves in sweatshirt fabric. Collar, press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud and ribbed cuffs.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist and straight, wide legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and a wrapover, jersey-lined funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Soft, non-wired bra top in lace with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.

Shoulder bag in glittery imitation leather with a flap with a concealed hook and loop fastening. Narrow, shimmering metallic shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size approx. 4x9.5x13 cm.

Shirt in a cotton herringbone weave with a button-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Captain’s cap in a textured weave. Satin lining.

Fully-fashioned trainers containing glittery threads with details in plastic and imitation leather. Elasticated top edge, a loop front and back, and elasticated lacing with a drawstring at the top. Mesh insoles and patterned soles.
Dungarees in soft, washed denim with adjustable straps, a chest pocket, side and back pockets, a low crotch and straight legs. The cotton content of the dungarees is partly recycled.
Calf-length skirt in soft viscose jersey with wide smocking at the waist for a comfortable fit over the tummy. Unlined.
Glittery ankle boots with a zip in the side and round toes. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 5.5 cm.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with an all-over print and hard-worn details. Concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist and zip fly with a button.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders with press-studs at one side, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Top in stretch cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves and a button placket. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Short, wide T-shirt in jersey with a motif on the front.
Hats in soft jersey.
Small bag in imitation suede and imitation leather with a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap and zip at the top. Lined. Size approx. 18.5x23.5 cm.

Slightly longer puffer jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood with a faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a chin guard at the top. Patch front pockets and covered elastication at the cuffs. Lined. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.

Ankle-length trousers in linen and cotton twill. High waist with pleats and a detachable belt with D-rings. Concealed zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Low crotch and wide, gently tapered legs with creases.
Short, fitted skirt in woven fabric. High waist with a concealed zip in one side and a sewn-in wrapover with pleats at the top. Recycled polyester lining.
T-shirts in airy cotton jersey with a chest pocket and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton with a motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, high-waisted trousers in washed stretch twill with a zip fly and button, and slim legs.

Shell jacket in windproof, breathable functional fabric with taped seams, waterproof zips and a hood with a reinforced peak and elasticated drawstring. Zip down the front, zipped side pockets and zips at both sides that open for ventilation. Snow flaps with reinforced elastication and adjustable press-stud fastenings at the waist, and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short, two-strand necklace with one thin chain and one chunky anchor chain. Adjustable length 43-50 cm.
Jumper in a soft, patterned fine knit with a round neckline and long sleeves. Soft brushed finish.
Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
